attributes.action: change local authorities procedures, Record everything
attributes.additional_details: Because I believe it is not right that the local authorities can write information down which has been misguided or out of context , and put this information towards court.if everything was recorded there wouldn’t be nothing been misguided or out of context
attributes.background: I would like the procedures to be changed as the local authorities do not agree to be recorded in meetings so I would like to change these procedures for the protection of all parties instead of the context been misguided

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you want local authorities to be required to record.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
